mapper.select: /*schedule.auto_customer*/ SELECT * FROM customer where c_tel LIKE '%' || #{c_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'

/*schedule.search_customer*/ SELECT customer.c_name as c_name, car_number, car_name, car_size, car_category, car_fuel_type FROM customer , car where customer.c_tel = car.c_tel and car.c_tel = #{c_tel} and car_number not in (select car_number from schedule where s_check in (0,1))

/*schedule.search_car*/ SELECT car_number ,car_size ,car_category ,car_fuel_type ,car_km ,car_name FROM car where car_number = #{car_number}
order by S_DATE desc

/*schedule.Calendar*/ select to_char(s_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi') as "start" ,(select c_name from customer where c_tel = schedule.c_tel) as title from schedule where to_char(s_date, 'YY') = to_char(sysdate, 'YY')

/*schedule.Select_schedule*/ SELECT c_tel ,car_number ,(select c_name from customer where customer.c_tel = s.C_TEL) as name ,s_check ,s_contents ,to_char(s_date, 'YY/MM/DD HH24') as s_date FROM schedule s WHERE substrb(s_date, 0, 8) = to_date(#{s_date}, 'YY/MM/DD')

/*schedule.Select_schedule*/ Select car_number ,car_name ,car_oil_date ,car_km ,car_fuel_type ,cs.c_tel ,cs.c_name ,cs.c_gender ,cs.c_email ,cs.c_comment from car , CUSTOMER cs where CAR_NUMBER = #{car_number} and cs.c_tel = #{c_tel}
/*schedule.Schedule_check*/ Select count(*) from Schedule where CAR_NUMBER = #{car_number} and s_check in (0,1)

/*schedule.Select_scheduleUpdate*/ Select s_no ,c_tel ,car_number ,S_CONTENTS ,s_check ,S_COMMENT ,TO_CHAR(S_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "date" ,TO_CHAR(S_DATE, 'HH24') "time" ,(select c_name from customer where c_tel = #{c_tel}) as c_name ,(select car_name from car where CAR_NUMBER = #{car_number}) as CAR_NUMBER ,(select car_size from car where CAR_NUMBER = #{car_number}) as car_size ,(select car_category from car where CAR_NUMBER = #{car_number}) as car_category ,(select car_fuel_type from car where CAR_NUMBER = #{car_number}) as car_fuel_type ,(select car_name from car where CAR_NUMBER = #{car_number}) as car_name
from schedule where c_tel = #{c_tel} and CAR_NUMBER = #{car_number} and s_check in (0,1)
